item.title: Business Rental
item.description: Business Rental Business Rental is an vertical solution developed by TWEECORE to extend the standard of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. Whether you want to rent out containers, forklifts, cars, work platforms or vacation homes - you always have all processes at your fingertips with just a few clicks. Business Rental enables you to map your entire rental business. Offers, invoices, credit notes and return deliveries Flexible billing periods
